Desc.eng: Great work, as always. And tell me, how did you like my deviously imaginative traps?
Absolutely not. They were quite useful.
I’m glad you see it that way. I recommend that we focus on our defenses. If you need some new traps, just tell me.
He’s afraid that these mechanical wonders will replace human hunters.
I’m not really convinced, you know.
I understand that you have your doubts, but I’d suggest we focus on our defenses. You can’t be everywhere. If you need some new traps, just tell me.
